attributes.title: Not So Extreme Makeover - Funhaus BTS Office Tour
attributes.caption: "Don't worry, I'm not a sociopath..."
attributes.description:
Thank you to Elgato for the gear! Check em out here: http://e.lga.to/Funhaus
And to https://tistis.net/  for some of the music used in this video!

You win, YouTube algorithm. Funhaus is now officially a makeover channel. Tune in next week when we apply contour and highlight makeup to Elyse and thread Jon Smith's butthole to within an inch of its life.

attributes.title: How AVATAR 2 Should End - Funhaus Animated
attributes.caption: "Massage the base."
attributes.description:
I hope these next few Avatar movies are successful just so we can see the fans waiting in line, painted head to toe, hissing and rubbing tips of their greasy little pony tails together until their mom has to come bring them a clean pair of pants.

attributes.title: Drunk Mario Kart: Days of Chunder - Funhaus Animated
attributes.caption: "Waggle. WAGGLE!"
attributes.description:
Thanks to ExpressVPN for sponsoring our channel http://expressvpn.com/funhaus

The first time I landed that secret Rainbow Road jump I thought my girlfriend would be so impressed she'd give me like a hundred hand jobs. Then I remembered I didn't have one and my neighbor asked me to give him his controller back. And to stop looking at his hands.
